channel.title: Sit command fail

item.title: Sit command fail
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

It doesn’t have to do with the command itself, you have to work on how your server updates the animations after an amount of time.

Read full topic

item.title: Sit command fail
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

my ::sit command only makes players sit for like a minute then they stand right back up… is there a way to make them sit longer?

[QUOTE] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“sit”) && c.sit == false) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot do this in wildy”);
return;
}
c.sit = true;
if(c.playerRights == 0) {
c.startAnimation(4108);
}
if(c.playerRights == 1) {
c.startAnimation(4113);
}
if(c.playerRights == 2) {
c.startAnimation(4115);
}
if(c.playerRights == 3) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
}
if(c.playerRights == 4) {
c.startAnimation(4111);
}
if(c.playerRights == 5) {
c.startAnimation(4116);
}
if(c.playerRights == 6) {
c.startAnimation(4112);
}
}[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
